item.title: Alternative app stores will be allowed on Apple iPad in the EU from September 16
item.description:
It was a matter of time, but Apple is going to allow third-party app stores on the iPad starting next week, on September 16. This change will occur with the next major release of iPadOS, the operating system specifically designed for the iPad. The move is related to the European Union’s Digital Markets Act (DMA), […]

item.description: The new AirPods 4 are more 'Pro' than ever.

item.title: Apple fixes dangerous 'GAZEploit' Vision Pro security flaw
item.description: Apple has fixed a Vision Pro security flaw that enabled hackers to steal passwords just by observing a user's eye movements.

item.title: Apple Watch Series 9 vs. SE: I tested both for 13 days
item.description: I'm a smartwatch skeptic who tested the Apple Watch Series 9 and SE for two weeks. Is the former really worth the extra $150?

item.title: I relived my high school days and used the Motorola Razr+ for a week
item.description: The Motorola Razr+ has some solid features and comes in exciting colors. But the practicality and image quality aren't there.

item.title: NASA spacecraft snaps photo of huge volcano forming on distant world
item.description: NASA's Juno spacecraft captured recent imagery of Jupiter's moon Io that showed the formation of a new volcano, including expansive lava flows.

item.description: Learn ethical hacking with hands-on courses, real-world examples, and over 100 hours of content for just $40.

item.title: Flash Pro Plus 100W USB-C 25000mAh Graphene Power Bank w/ Magsafe Compatibility
item.description: The Flash Pro Plus 100W Graphene Power Bank keeps your devices powered with 25,000mAh capacity and USB-C charging.

item.title: Make your car instantly smarter with a wireless CarPlay adapter on sale for $90
item.description: Enjoy wireless CarPlay and Android Auto with built-in streaming apps and storage in one sleek adapter, on sale for just $89.97.

item.title: The best Windows laptops: Our No. 1 pick might convert Apple fans
item.description: Mashable's hands-on guide to the best Windows laptops includes the Microsoft Surface Laptop 7, the HP OmniBook X 14, and the Lenovo Yoga 9i (Gen 9).
